President has visited countries with which we have direct trade relations
Polar_expression: with the specific objective of strengthening our economy

text: As for the criticisms of the destinations of the presidential trips , she remarked : " In addition to the fact that we do not have to ask anyone for permission to decide where and when we should visit a country , the President has visited countries with which we have direct trade relations , countries that are OPEC members , with the specific objective of strengthening our economy . "
